verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: إِذَا <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':14351'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>سَّم<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓءُ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':14390'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':14391'>نش</tajweed>َقَّتْ
verses.translation: Когда (послушно Богу) раскололся небосклон

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَأَذِنَتْ لِرَبِّهَا وَحُقَّتْ
verses.translation: Как было должно по Его веленью

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَإِذَا <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':14392'>ٱ</tajweed>لْأَرْضُ مُدَّتْ
verses.translation: Когда расправилась земля

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَأَلْقَتْ مَا فِيهَا وَتَخَلَّتْ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa alqat mā fīhā wa takhallat.
verses.translation: Извергнув все, что в ней, и опустела

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَأَذِنَتْ لِرَبِّهَا وَحُقَّتْ
verses.translation: Как было должно по Его веленью

verses.text_uthmani: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلْإِنسَـٰنُ إِنَّكَ كَادِحٌ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ كَدْحًا فَمُلَـٰقِيهِ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: يَ<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ـٰٓ</tajweed>أَيُّهَا <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':14358'>ٱ</tajweed>لْإِ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':2732'>نس</tajweed>َ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>نُ إِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َكَ كَادِحٌ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ كَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':14393'>دْ</tajweed><tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':14394'>حًا ف</tajweed>َمُلَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>ق<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>هِ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Yā ayyuhal-insānu innaka kādiḥun ilā rabbika kadḥan fa mulāqīh(i).
verses.translation: О человек! Стремишься ты к Владыке своему (Чрез все невзгоды бытия земного) - И ты узришь Его

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: فَأَ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>مّ</tajweed>َا مَنْ أُوتِىَ كِتَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>بَهُ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ۥ</tajweed> بِيَمِينِهِۦ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Fa ammā man ūtiya kitābahū biyamīnih(ī).
verses.translation: И тот, кому представят книгу (Земных деяний) в праву руку

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: فَسَوْفَ يُحَاسَبُ حِسَا<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':14395'>بًا ي</tajweed>َسِيرًا
verses.translation: Рассчитан будет легким счетом

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَيَ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':14396'>نق</tajweed>َلِبُ إِلَ<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ىٰٓ</tajweed> أَهْلِه<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ِۦ</tajweed> مَسْرُورًا
verses.translation: И в радости вернется к близким и собратьям

verses.text_uthmani: وَأَمَّا مَنْ أُوتِىَ كِتَـٰبَهُۥ وَرَآءَ ظَهْرِهِۦ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَأَ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>مّ</tajweed>َا مَنْ أُوتِىَ كِتَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>بَهُ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ۥ</tajweed> وَر<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓءَ ظَهْرِهِۦ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa ammā man ūtiya kitābahū warā'a ẓahrih(ī).
verses.translation: Но тот, кому представят книгу со спины

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: فَسَوْفَ يَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':1242'>دْ</tajweed>عُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> ثُبُورًا
verses.translation: Взмолит о гибели, (чтоб не страдать)

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَيَصْلَىٰ سَعِيرًا
verses.translation: В пылающий Огонь войдет он

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: إِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َهُ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ۥ</tajweed> كَانَ ف<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ِىٓ</tajweed> أَهْلِه<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ِۦ</tajweed> مَسْرُورًا
verses.translation: А на земле, среди друзей и близких, Он радости исполнен был

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: إِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َهُ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ۥ</tajweed> ظَ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َ أ<tajweed class='idgh_w_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - Without Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':8842'>َن ل</tajweed>ّ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':14397'>َن ي</tajweed>َح<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>رَ
verses.translation: Ведь он тогда уверен был, Что никогда он к Нам не возвратится

verses.text_uthmani: بَلَىٰٓ إِنَّ رَبَّهُۥ كَانَ بِهِۦ بَصِيرًا
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: بَلَ<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ىٰٓ</tajweed> إِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َ رَبَّهُ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ۥ</tajweed> كَانَ بِه<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ِۦ</tajweed> بَصِيرًا
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Balā, inna rabbahū kāna bihī baṣīrā(n).
verses.translation: Но нет! Господь следил за ним

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: فَل<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َآ</tajweed> أُ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':13287'>قْ</tajweed>سِمُ بِ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':14398'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>شَّفَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah'>ق</tajweed>ِ
verses.translation: Клянусь сияньем красного заката

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':9999'>ٱ</tajweed>لَّيْلِ وَمَا وَسَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah'>ق</tajweed>َ
verses.translation: И ночью той, что собирает на ночлег (Все сущее на сей земле)

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':9999'>ٱ</tajweed>لْقَمَرِ إِذَا <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':14399'>ٱ</tajweed>تَّسَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah'>ق</tajweed>َ
verses.translation: Луной, когда она полнеет

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: لَتَرْكَبُ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َ طَبَقًا عَ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':14400'>ن ط</tajweed>َبَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah'>ق</tajweed>ٍ
verses.translation: Вам предстоит ступени все пройти - (И жизнь, и смерть, и Воскресенье)

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: فَمَا لَهُمْ لَا يُؤْمِن<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.translation: Так что ж удерживает их от веры

verses.text_uthmani: وَإِذَا قُرِئَ عَلَيْهِمُ ٱلْقُرْءَانُ لَا يَسْجُدُونَ ۩
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَإِذَا قُرِئَ عَلَيْهِمُ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':14401'>ٱ</tajweed>لْقُرْءَانُ لَا يَسْجُدُ<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>و</tajweed>نَ ۩
verses.translation: И что ж они колен не преклоняют, Когда Коран зачитывают им

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: بَلِ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':10932'>ٱ</tajweed>لَّذِينَ كَفَرُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> يُكَذِّب<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.translation: И более того, они пренебрегают (им)

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':9999'>ٱ</tajweed>للَّهُ أَعْلَمُ بِمَا يُوع<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.translation: Аллах же знает все, что в их душе сокрыто

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: فَبَشِّرْه<tajweed class='ikhf_shfw' data-type='ikhafa-shafawi' data-description='Ikhafa' Shafawi - With Meem' data-tajweed=':1811'>ُم ب</tajweed>ِعَذَابٍ أَل<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>مٍ
verses.translation: Так сообщи им о тяжелом наказанье

verses.text_uthmani: إِلَّا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ لَهُمْ أَجْرٌ غَيْرُ مَمْنُونٍۭ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: إِلَّا <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':778'>ٱ</tajweed>لَّذِينَ ءَامَنُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> وَعَمِلُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':118'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>صَّ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>لِحَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>تِ لَهُمْ أَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':2423'>جْ</tajweed>رٌ غَيْرُ مَمْن<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نِۭ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Illal-lażīna āmanū wa 'amiluṣ-ṣāliḥāti lahum ajrun gairu mamnūn(in).
verses.translation: Всем, кроме тех, которые уверовали (в Бога) И праведные действия вершат, - Их ждет неистощимая награда
